about_the_game:
Animal Rogues is a challenging dark rogue-lite dungeon crawler with rpg and bullet hell elements.

Defeat all enemies in one room after another and get the reward you deserve!

The game offers you 4 wonderful floors with unique sets of enemies to discover.

Unlock and play 10 different animals!

Dive into your adventures with 10 different animals, each with its own unique passive abilities.

Stumble upon slot machines, roll the dice, and let fate decide!

There are around 15 stats to be increased. Collect keys, flowers and gems.

Master the art of portal-spawning!

Leap between dimensions, fast travelling and ambushing foes.

Choose among over 200 items!

Collect arcane relics that pulse with forbidden energy.

Key Features:

  • Unlock 10 different animals with unique passive abilities!
  • Over 40 unique enemies, twisted by malefic forces, hungry for your demise.
  • Hidden Treasures: As you descend, discover bizarre and interactive objects strewn across the cursed landscape. Spin the Slot of Destiny, where luck can turn the tide of battle. Roll the Dice, find keys, flowers and gems.
  • Magical Artifacts: Collect arcane relics that pulse with forbidden energy. Choose among over 200 items.
  • Portals to the Unknown: Master the art of portal-spawning. Leap between dimensions, fast travelling and ambushing foes.
  • Complete all the challenges to obtain even more gems and buy power ups to become immortal!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.40 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM | OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game builds are not actively tested on Windows versions below Windows 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3GB VRAM | OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Animal Rogues is a dark rogue-lite dungeon crawler bullet-hell with rpg elements. You play as an animal who fights against one possessed beast after another! Discover unique interactable objects such as slot machines, dices.. Collect magical items and level up to become more and more powerful!
supported_languages: English, Italian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
